SegmentationRules.dataRetrievalCommand:
SELECT concat(BRKEY, Bridge_ID) AS UniqueIdentifier,
                         CAST(INSPDATE AS DATETIME) AS DateTime, CAST(REPLACE(ADTTOTAL, ',', '') AS float) AS Value
                         FROM dbo.PennDot_Report_A
                         WHERE (ISNUMERIC(ADTTOTAL) = 1)
